title: A Memorial Font - serif
content:
Hello again, another memorial font, I have seen this before but don't know the name. As it is someones gravestone we must match the fonts exactly. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thankyou.

Font: 

 Plantin Bold 

Solved By: 

 [donshottype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075939/http:/typophile.com/user/205259 "View user profile.")

author: fishy_safc

comments.content: Picture does not seem to be showing

Looks like Aldine 721 Bold [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/aldine-721/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075939/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/aldine-721/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/aldine-721/") or Plantin Bold  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/plantin/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075939/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/plantin/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/plantin/")  
Don
Perfect, Plantin bold matched exactly. Thankyou
